original_text: This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘Now go and speak to Shebna, the officer with authority in the king's palace. Verses 15 to 24 are about royal officers called Shebna and Eliakim. This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘Now go and speak to Shebna, the officer with authority in the king's palace.
korean_text: 주 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 너는 가서 그 국고를 맡고 왕궁 맡은 자 셉나를 보고 이르기를

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord Almighty says
Now go and speak to Shebna
the officer with authority in the king's palace
Verses 15 to 24 are about royal officers
